name: Castle of no Escape 2 (Early Build)
description:
This game was released on Steam, see info and buy there: http://store.steampowered.com/app/542350/

"Castle of no Escape 2" is a new game following and expanding the setting of the first "Castle of no Escape" game, which is finished and can be downloaded for free at http://xitilon.itch.io/castle-of-no-escape

Like the first game, it's a dungeon crawler about the mysterious castle "full of monsters and secrets in a quest to collect all the treasures" and "crush the main boss.".

Unlike the first game, it's not turn-based, and should feel more like first Zelda, Binding of Isaac and such.

By DEX Team (TheDreik, Esdeer, Xitilon).

Thanks for the support, the project was successfully Greenlit!
http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/...

Made with Game Maker 8.1, NOT Game Maker: Studio (which is actually good, but I had too much codebase from earlier times to migrate).
